summary: Email exchange between an FBI Victim Services Program Manager and a Southern District of New York Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding the attendance of attorney Spencer Kuvin at meetings in Florida and New York related to the Epstein case. The FBI confirms Kuvin was not present at either meeting.

persons.name: Spencer Kuvin
persons.context: Attorney who has been providing quotes to the media about meetings in Florida and New York related to the Epstein case, but confirmed not to have attended either meeting.

persons.name: Amanda
persons.role: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division
persons.context: FBI Victim Services Program Manager who confirms to an AUSA that Spencer Kuvin was not at the Florida or New York meetings.

connections.description: Amanda, as FBI Victim Services Program Manager, is confirming the non-attendance of attorney Spencer Kuvin at case-related meetings.

events.title: Email confirmation about meeting attendance
events.description: FBI Victim Services confirms to a Southern District of New York AUSA that attorney Spencer Kuvin was not present at meetings in Florida and New York related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: Attorney Spencer Kuvin was providing media quotes about Epstein case meetings he did not attend.
The FBI Victim Services Division confirmed Kuvin was not at meetings in Florida or New York.
The communication shows coordination between the FBI and the Southern District of New York U.S. Attorney's Office regarding case details and media inquiries.
